languages.text: "Хочешь оспорить дарованные мне {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g} привилегии? Попробуй. Пусть {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}миссия святого Друза{/g} выставляет своего чемпиона, я прикончу его в судебном поединке".

traits.locale_text: "Хочешь оспорить дарованные мне Императором привилегии? Попробуй. Пусть миссия святого Друза выставляет своего чемпиона, я прикончу его в судебном поединке".

languages.text: "You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."
languages.original_text: "Хочешь оспорить дарованные мне {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императором{/g} привилегии? Попробуй. Пусть {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}миссия святого Друза{/g} выставляет своего чемпиона, я прикончу его в судебном поединке".

traits.locale_text: "You would call the privileges bestowed upon me by the Emperor into question? You can try. Let the Saint Drusus mission put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."
"You would call the privileges bestowed upon me by the Emperor into question? You can try. Let the Saint Drusus mission put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

"You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

"You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

"You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}より授かった俺の特権に疑いを持っているのか？できるものならやってみろ。{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}聖ドルスス聖務団{/g}に戦士を出させろ。決闘裁判で俺がそいつを殺してやる」
languages.original_text: "You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}より授かった俺の特権に疑いを持っているのか？できるものならやってみろ。{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}聖ドルスス聖務団{/g}に戦士を出させろ。決闘裁判で俺がそいつを殺してやる」

languages.text: “你是在质疑{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}授予我的特权吗？有种就试试。让你们{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教派{/g}派个勇士来吧，我会在决斗中拧下他的脑袋。”
languages.original_text: "You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

traits.locale_text: “你是在质疑{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}授予我的特权吗？有种就试试。让你们{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教派{/g}派个勇士来吧，我会在决斗中拧下他的脑袋。”

languages.text: «¿Cuestiona acaso los privilegios que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} me ha concedido? Es libre de intentarlo. Que la misión de {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}San Drusus{/g} nombre a su campeón y lo abatiré en un juicio por combate».
languages.original_text: "You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cuestiona acaso los privilegios que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} me ha concedido? Es libre de intentarlo. Que la misión de {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}San Drusus{/g} nombre a su campeón y lo abatiré en un juicio por combate».

languages.text: « Vous oseriez remettre en question les privilèges qui me sont accordés par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} lui-même ? Vous pouvez toujours essayer. Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Ordre de Saint Drusus{/g} m'envoie son champion, je me ferai un plaisir de le découper en rondelles dans un duel judiciaire. »
languages.original_text: "You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

traits.locale_text: « Vous oseriez remettre en question les privilèges qui me sont accordés par l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} lui-même ? Vous pouvez toujours essayer. Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Ordre de Saint Drusus{/g} m'envoie son champion, je me ferai un plaisir de le découper en rondelles dans un duel judiciaire. »

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr etwa die Privilegien, die mir der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} verliehen hat, in Zweifel ziehen? Versucht es ruhig. Lasst die {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Mission des Hl. Drusus{/g} ihren Champion schicken, ich werde ihn bei einem Gerichtskampf erschlagen."
languages.original_text: "You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr etwa die Privilegien, die mir der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} verliehen hat, in Zweifel ziehen? Versucht es ruhig. Lasst die {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Mission des Hl. Drusus{/g} ihren Champion schicken, ich werde ihn bei einem Gerichtskampf erschlagen."

languages.text: "Bana {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} tarafından lütfedilen ayrıcalıkları mı sorguluyorsun? İstediğin kadar sorgula. {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Aziz Drusus misyonu{/g}, müdafisini çıkarsın da dövüşle imtihanda bak nasıl kesiyorum onu."
languages.original_text: "You would call into question the privileges bestowed upon me by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}? You can try. Let the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Saint Drusus mission{/g} put forth their champion, and I will slay him in a trial by combat."

traits.locale_text: "Bana {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} tarafından lütfedilen ayrıcalıkları mı sorguluyorsun? İstediğin kadar sorgula. {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Aziz Drusus misyonu{/g} müdafisini çıkarsın ortaya da dövüşle imtihanda bak nasıl kesiyorum onu."
